name: Pork Roast Patties
ingredients: Oil or pork fat for frying

instructions.en: Roughly chop the leftover roast pork and put it in a food processor with the chopping blade.
instructions.sk: Nahrubo nasekajte zvyšné pečené bravčové mäso a vložte ho do kuchynského robota s nožom na sekanie.
instructions.ja: 残りの焼き豚を大まかに切り、フードプロセッサーのチョッピングブレードで処理します。

instructions.en: Pulse until the meat is ground but not pureed.
instructions.sk: Pulzujte, kým sa mäso nerozmelie, ale nie na kašu.
instructions.ja: 肉がひき肉状になるまでパルス機能で処理しますが、ペースト状にはしないでください。

instructions.en: Add an egg or two and process to blend it with the meat.
instructions.sk: Pridajte jedno alebo dve vajcia a spracujte, aby sa zmiešali s mäsom.
instructions.ja: 卵を1〜2個加え、肉とよく混ざるまで処理します。
混ぜた材料でパティ状に成形します。

instructions.en: Pan-fry in hot oil until crispy and brown on the outside.
instructions.sk: Smažte na horúcom oleji, kým nie sú zvonku chrumkavé a hnedé.
instructions.ja: 熱した油で外側がカリッと茶色くなるまで焼きます。

notes: This recipe is versatile. You can add various spices, onions, or other ingredients to the patties for different flavors. The dish is virtually carb-free, consisting mainly of pork, fat, and egg.
